verses.name: Mark 11:16
verses.text: And would not suffer that any man should carry any vessel through the temple.

verses.name: Mark 11:17
verses.text: And he taught, saying unto them, Is it not written, My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer? but ye have made it a den of thieves.

verses.name: Mark 11:18
verses.text: And the scribes and chief priests heard it, and sought how they might destroy him: for they feared him, because all the people was astonished at his doctrine.

verses.name: Mark 11:19
verses.text: And when even was come, he went out of the city.
